entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
